metadata.dc:author: Ferrer-Ayza, Manuel
Reina-Duarte, Angel
Ferrer-Márquez, Manuel
Vidaña-Márquez, Elisabeth
Belda-Lozano, Ricardo
Rodríguez-Ruiz, Osorio
Belda-Poujoulet, Ricardo
metadata.dc:description: We present the case of a woman who underwent surgery for an ileal carcinoid tumor and who subsequently presented breast metastases. The rarity of this case is discussed and a literature review is presented.
metadata.dc:title: Metástasis tardía en mama de tumor carcinoide intestinal.
[Late breast metastases from an intestinal carcinoid tumor].
